thread.title: BRIEF-Everbridge Inc To Acquire All Issued Share Capital Of Unified Messaging Systems ASA

title: BRIEF-Everbridge Inc To Acquire All Issued Share Capital Of Unified Messaging Systems ASA

organizations.name: pital of unified messaging systems asa reuters

text: March 1, 2018 / 9:27 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Everbridge Inc To Acquire All Issued Share Capital Of Unified Messaging Systems ASA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Everbridge Inc: * EVERBRIDGE COMMENCES A RECOMMENDED CASH OFFER TO ACQUIRE THE ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF UNIFIED MESSAGING SYSTEMS ASA * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍OFFER VALUES TOTAL SHARE CAPITAL OF UMS AT APPROXIMATELY NOK 268 MILLION​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF UMS HAS RECOMMENDED THAT SHAREHOLDERS ACCEPT OFFER​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍OFFER PERIOD STARTS ON 2 MARCH 2018 AND EXPIRES ON 16 MARCH 2018​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - CO INTENDS TO MAKE COMPULSORY ACQUISITION OF REMAINING SHARES IN UMS UPON ACQUIRING NOT LESS THAN 90% OF SHARES IN UMS UNDER OFFER​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍OFFER IS NOT SUBJECT TO ANY FINANCING CONDITIONS OR REGULATORY APPROVALS​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍COMMENCEMENT OF VOLUNTARY CASH OFFER TO ACQUIRE ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF UNIFIED MESSAGING SYSTEMS FOR NOK 1.37 PER SHARE​ * EVERBRIDGE INC - ‍EVERBRIDGE HAS OBTAINED PRE-ACCEPTANCES REPRESENTING APPROXIMATELY 68.2% OF UMS’ ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
